subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: The Olympic and world giant slalom champion Ted Ligety said he tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee during a training crash Wednesday in Oberjoch, Germany.
snippet: The Olympic and world giant slalom champion Ted Ligety said he tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee during a training crash Wednesday in Oberjoch, Germany.
